original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-07-28 13:25:35' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount<=4 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-03 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.DownVotes=0 AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-08 07:03:29' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-07-28 13:25:35'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND (CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) <= 4)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes = 0 AND users.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-08 07:03:29'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E4.Id)

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-03 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E4.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E4E3 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E4E3.Id)
